title: SFEC Form 126f2 - Notification of Submission of Proposal
description:
Each City agency seeking to enter into a contract that has a total anticipated or actual value of $100,000 or more must file this form with the Ethics Commission within 30 days of the submission of a proposal.  For more information, see: https://sfethics.org/compliance/city-officers/city-contracts/city-departments

The Named Parties dataset (https://data.sfgov.org/d/djj2-gvaq/) must be joined with the parent dataset (https://data.sfgov.org/d/pv99-gzft) using the DocuSignID to connect contractors and subcontractors to the proposals.

columns.name: DocuSign ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign

columns.name: Public URL
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing

columns.name: Filing Type
columns.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing; a Supplemental is a continuation of a filing, indicating more fields were required.

columns.name: Original Filing Date
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing

columns.name: Amendment Description
columns.description: Explanation for Amendment, provided by filer

columns.name: City Agency Name
columns.description: Full name of the City Agency submitting the form

columns.name: City Agency Contact Name
columns.description: Name of the contact person at the City Agency submitting the form

columns.name: City Agency Contact Telephone
columns.description: Telephone number of the contact person at the City Agency submitting the form

columns.name: City Agency Contact Email
columns.description: Email Address of the contact person at the City Agency submitting the form

columns.name: Bid Rfp Number
columns.description: Bid or RFP number of proposed contract

columns.name: Nature of Contract
columns.description: Short description of the nature of the contract

columns.name: Additional Names Required
columns.description: Checkbox indicating if additional pages are required to list all parties to the proposal. If checked, there should be an additional filing of type "Supplemental".

columns.name: Signer Name
columns.description: Name of the person signing the form on behalf of the City Agency

columns.name: Signer Title
columns.description: Title of the person signing the form on behalf of the City Agency

columns.name: Date Signed
columns.description: Date form was signed and submitted to the Ethics Commission
